name: KOLMAN
description: The game is about Lukas Kolman, A 20-year-old elite martial arts student, sees a group of criminals wipe out his local police during a drug bust and politicians sweep it under the rug. He decides to take matters into his own hands and attempts to take down the civil war between his city. Play as a masked vigilante taking down the corrupt system with a combat system based on the fear takedown from the Arkham games.
